title: Ba Fang Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Singaporean
description: 八方素食 is located at Stall 17 in the staff canteen of Changi Airport Terminal 2. Directions: Go past Starbucks on Level 2 to the carpark, then take stairs up to Level 3M. Serves local food and economic rice. Closes every second Sunday of the month.
streetAddress: Changi Airport, Carpark C, 3M floor, Stall 17, Terminal 2
